p3sec_ui.c File Reference

Detailed Description

Protected Point to Point secondary user interface file

Copyright (C) Velocite 2010

The secondary user interface is used to manage the key server as well as secondary P3 systems.

#include "p3sec_ui.h"
#include "p3secondary.h"

Here is the call graph for this function:

int sec_ui_handler (  ) 

Function:
sec_ui_handler
Description:
Wait for input from the administrator interface through a FIFO. The P3 secondary interface then updates the configuration, and if appropriate, dynamically updates the application.
Inputs:
  • None
Outputs:
  • int: Status
    • 0 = OK
    • <0 = Error

Referenced by init_sec_ui().
